name: MOWING
description:
Ever wondered WHAT it's LIKE to MOW?

Description

UH-OH! You heard some STRANGE SOUNDS coming from the DESERT! Better grab your trusty MOWER and take a LOOK! Oh, and don't forget your MAGIC GRASS! You know what I mean, eh? CORRECT! The seeds that you plant that form a path of GRASS towards your GOAL!

HEY! It's one of your TRUSTY blades of GRASS that will GUIDE you to your GOAL! MOW it down and the next one will pop up! LOOK at those BEAUTIFUL GRAPHICS! UH-OH! What's that MYSTERIOUS CREATURE flying through the AIR? Whatever it is, it is NOT FRIENDLY! These things will try to plant FAKE GRASS to MISLEAD you! I guess you'll have to MURDER them with your MACHINE GUN!
